DOC.brief_summary: Single center , open-label randomized-control trial Population : de novo 48 kidney transplant recipient ( age 18-75 year ) ECD/AKI donor Compare : everolimus low dose CNI prednisolone versus standard immunosuppressive regimen Objective : To evaluate efficacy everolimus low dose CNI de novo kidney transplant recipient ECD/AKI donor Primary endpoint : Mean eGFR ( CKD-EPI ) 12 month post-transplantation
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Everolimus de Novo Kidney Transplant Recipients ECD AKI Donors
